title: Simply Photo Watch Face
summary: Simple, crisp, no frills watch face with a color or photo background.
description: Simply is a no frills, crisp, clear watch face designed to be clean and easy to read at a distance. Simply allows you to use a photo or color as a background for a distraction free watch face. Simply features a large ambient mode with easy to read lettering to make your watch easy to see from a distance, A pre-built list of hand picked colors designed to work best with your watch, and two build in backgrounds for a clean, simple visible digital clock.Permissions: Internet: -Used for crash reporting to provide better service and applications in the futureWake lock: -Used by Android Wear to update the watch display. Write External Storage:-Used to save a photo to the watch face background.
descriptionHTML:
Simply is a no frills, crisp, clear watch face designed to be clean and easy to read at a distance. Simply allows you to use a photo or color as a background for a distraction free watch face. Simply features a large ambient mode with easy to read lettering to make your watch easy to see from a distance, A pre-built list of hand picked colors designed to work best with your watch, and two build in backgrounds for a clean, simple visible digital clock.


Permissions:

Internet:
-Used for crash reporting to provide better service and applications in the future

Wake lock:
-Used by Android Wear to update the watch display.

Write External Storage:
-Used to save a photo to the watch face background.
comments: really simple and awesome it would be nice if you can add weather bar under the time :)
Great It's great but can you make the date be able to change to "Day, 1 month" instead of "Day, month 1"
